ComicInfo.Summary: After narrowly escaping from the Justice League, Batman, Green Arrow, and the Bat family regroup, but soon they are confronted by the vampire duo of Wonder Woman and Green Lantern. The Suicide Squad fights against two of their own who have been turned into vampires. Batman and his team are able to stop Wonder Woman and Green Lantern, but then are unexpectedly attacked by one of their allies.
